test-set.name: xp-striding-striding-consumingA
test-set.description: CP: Striding, RP: Striding, RS: Consuming Child axis on child or self axis with striding context selecting elements is striding and consuming

test-case.name: xp-striding-striding-consumingA001
test-case.description: CP: striding, RP: striding, RS: consuming Base expression: foo Separators: / With axes: child With node types: element, any-node, doc-elem Invariant: none

modified.change: Added dependency for sweep and posture tests, added @part attribute for subtests
